name: Siege of the Necromancer
description:
Use gestures in VR to raise an undead army to defeat your foes. Raise your minions to fight for you and reraise them if they die. You can blast them with health to help in your battle and your can cast damage spells against your foes as well.

(At least in theory that's how it would work. I couldn't get the gesture system working so you cast the spell with three buttons. Then I couldn't get the projectiles working with the AI system, so double fail I guess)
